  • Method Details

    • authorize

      @GetMapping("/user/integration/git/github/authorize") public void authorize(@NotNull @NotNull User user, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws URISyntaxException, IOException
      Redirects user to GitHub authorization page. Should not be used as rest endpoint.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      response - response to redirect
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if URI is malformed
      IOException - if redirect fails

    • authorizeCallback

      @GetMapping("/user/integration/git/github/authorize_callback") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> authorizeCallback(@RequestParam(required=false) String code, @RequestParam(required=false) String state, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Callback for redirect from success GitHub user authorization.
      Parameters:
      code - code to get user access token
      state - the state
      response - response
      Returns:
      mono that will call redirect when finished
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getAuthorizations

      @GetMapping("/user/integration/git/github") public List<Authorization> getAuthorizations(@NotNull @NotNull User user)
      Retrieves all GitHub authorizations for logged in user.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      Returns:
      list of GitHub authorizations

    • deleteAuthorization

      @DeleteMapping("/user/integration/git/github/{id}") public void deleteAuthorization(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Deletes GitHub authorization.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - id of authorization

    • getRepositories

      @GetMapping("/user/integration/git/github/repository") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Repositories> getRepositories(@NotNull @NotNull User user)
      Retrieve repositories. Retrieves all GitHub repositories available to user.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      Returns:
      list of GitHub repositories

    • createProjectIntegration

      @PostMapping("/project/{id}/integration/git/github") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Project> createProjectIntegration(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id, @RequestBody Repository repository)
      Creates project integration. Creates project integration with GitHub repository.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - id of project
      repository - GitHub repository
      Returns:
      updated project

    • deleteProjectIntegration

      @DeleteMapping("/project/{projectId}/integration/git/github") public void deleteProjectIntegration(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long projectId, @PathVariable long id)
      Deletes project integration. Deletes project integration with GitHub repository.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      projectId - id of project
      id - id of project integration
